div.div: at New Ulm, Minn. | MLC Bowl

tr.td: Martin Luther wins the toss and will receive

Nathan Guhl rush for 4 yards to the MLC35 (Anto. Greenwood).
Matt Olson pass incomplete to Josh Rathje.
Nathan Guhl rush for 3 yards to the MLC38 (Ty Cowin).
